nodes.text: The Response package augmented the regular impulses of the nervous system, allowing for a greater efficiency in dexterous muscle action most noticeably in the volume of the user's movement. Unfortunately, the lack of movement may have caused the user to suffer the odd lingering twitch.
In KotOR, the playable character must have the implant feat at level 1.
In KotOR II: TSL, the playable character must have a constitution attribute of 12 or higher.
